mapper.select: select DISTINCT b.board_no, b.product_name, s.sharing_no, s.seller_id, s.buyer_id, m.member_phone, s.sharing_start, s.sharing_end, s.transaction_state from (sharing s join board b on s.seller_id=#{value} and s.board_no=b.board_no) join (sharing s2 join member m on s2.buyer_id=m.member_id) on s.buyer_id=s2.buyer_id order by board_no

select DISTINCT b.board_no, b.product_name, s.sharing_no, s.seller_id, s.buyer_id, m.member_phone, s.sharing_start, s.sharing_end, s.transaction_state from (sharing s join board b on s.buyer_id=#{value} and s.board_no=b.board_no) join (sharing s2 join member m on s2.seller_id=m.member_id) on s.buyer_id=s2.buyer_id order by board_no
mapper.update: update sharing set transaction_state='대여중' where sharing_start < sysdate and transaction_state='대여대기'
